edu.ohiou.labimp.basis
Class ViewObject

java.lang.Object
  edu.ohiou.labimp.basis.ViewObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable2D, Viewable, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ch2p30Class, Ch9p22Class, Cycloid, DrawString, Integrator, LissajousCurve, PiEstimator, PropertyTable
public class ViewObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements Viewable, Drawable2D, java.io.Serializable

ViewObject class is a root class for all process planning related objects in labimp and IMPlanner development. It provides for easy implementation of visual displays on any object in IMPlanner development

See Also:
Serialized Form

display

public void display(java.lang.String inTitle,
                    int appletClosing)
Displays the object in its applet. This method is implementation method for verifying object visibility, applet existnace and sending the request to applet for display

Parameters:
inTitle - String to be display in the title bar of the applet's frame
inSize - Dimansion of the applet's frame on screen
appletClosing - the desired behavior when applat frame window is closed

generateImageList

public void generateImageList()
Description copied from interface: Drawable2D
method that generates a hashmap of images. This method places tham into a hashMap of Draw2DPanel. This method should call addImage from Draw2DPanel and supply image and its affine transformion target space. Image dimansions inpixels are dimensions in target space so scaling may be necessary before submitting images to Draw2Dpanel

Specified by:
generateImageList in interface Drawable2D
